name: Mobile Touch
description:
Mobile Touch is a software development company that focuses on mobile software development with an emphasis on touch screen based devices. It currently develops projects on iOS (iPhone, iPod touch, iPad), android and blackberry.
Mobile Touch was founded in 2008 in Iasi, Romania by Vasile Alaiba and Alexandru Radulescu. It is a Romanian company financed entirely by it's partners. 
The vision of the company is to become the "implementor of choice" for mobile applications in Romania.
